snippet: R. A. Dickey struck out a career-high 12 batters, broke the Mets’ franchise record for the most consecutive scoreless innings and guided the Mets to a victory against the Rays.
abstract: New York Mets beat Tampa Bay Rays, 9-1; Mets pitcher R A Dickey strikes out a career-high 12 batters, breaking franchise record for the most consecutive scoreless innings.
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey struck out a career-high 12 batters, broke the Mets’ franchise record for the most consecutive scoreless innings and guided the Mets to a victory against the Rays.

headline.seo: Dickey Is Sharp Again as Mets Beat Rays
headline.print_headline: Dickey’s Latest Work Is Close To Perfect
